body.raw:
{
    // Zorunlu Müşteri bilgileri
    "AuthorizedPersonRelatedCustomer": {
        "CustomerId": "53671B3F-708D-490F-9797-DC6B328363F0",
        "CustomerCode": "MBL_20221124154436547",
        "Title": "Test ekmob"
    },
    "CustomerAuthorizedPersonFullName": "Yusuf oğuz", // Zorunlu Adı Soyadı
    "CustomerAuthorizedPersonCode": "PNL_1669294882284_46da0117-8", // Zorunlu sistem otomatik üretir
    "CustomerAuthorizedPersonFirstPhoneNumber": "", // telefon
    "CustomerAuthorizedPersonFirstPhoneNumberExtension": "", // telefon dahili
    "CustomerAuthorizedPersonFirstMobileNumber": "+905316518762", // cep telefonu zorunlu
    "CustomerAuthorizedPersonFirstEmailAddress": "", // email adresi
    "CustomerAuthorizedPersonWebSiteUrl": "", // web sitesi
    "CustomerAuthorizedPersonPostalCode": "", // posta kodu
    "CustomerAuthorizedPersonPosition": "danışman", // pozisyonu
    "CustomerAuthorizedPersonLatitude": 0.0, // konum latitude
    "CustomerAuthorizedPersonLongitude": 0.0, // konum longitude
    "IsDeleted": false // bu şekilde gönderin silindimi ?
}

request.description:
Returns a list of departments specified by the query parameters. 
Departments are managed by the customer and contains users. In portfolio management, roles are based on departments. A user can belong to one department only.

urlencoded.description: Your client identification assigned by Ekmob
Your client secret assigned by Ekmob
The scopes you wish to use while accessing the api, separated by space. You can see the required scope at every route definition
Culture info for api results and errors

request.description: Obtain an access token for requests. Every request in Ekmob.Api requires an access token.
